text: William Alfred Crawford (8 May 1872 – 1955) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1872 births Category:1955 deaths Category:People from Darlington Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Stockton F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Bill Crawford (footballer)
